name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: As a results-driven Senior Product Manager with over 8 years of cross-functional collaboration experience, I excel in product management and strategic planning. My expertise in **User Experience (UX)** design and **Data Analysis** enhances product development, ensuring alignment with market needs and customer discovery initiatives. Skilled in **A/B Testing** to validate product features, I prioritize stakeholder alignment and roadmap management, driving decisions that support product excellence. With strong communication skills and a focus on **SaaS** solutions, I bridge technical and business teams to deliver successful outcomes. My background in software engineering as a Senior Python Full Stack Developer ensures a deep understanding of technology, having developed modern applications using **Python** (FastAPI, Django, Flask, SQLAlchemy) and frontend frameworks like **Angular**, **Vue**, **React**, and **Next.js**. I am well-versed in deploying applications on **AWS** and **Azure**, optimizing databases with **PostgreSQL**, **MySQL**, and **MongoDB**, and applying microservices architecture alongside **REST**/gRPC API development.
